headline: Show HN: CL and FB reselling app with auto renew and auto price reduction
description:
I recently moved apartments and had a lot of stuff I wanted to get rid of.

I found the reselling process to be cumbersome – I needed to post the same info twice, to both Facebook and Craigslist. I had to renew the items so they don't expire. I also had to reduce the item prices if they didn't sell.

So I decided to do what any right minded overzealous, "pragmatic" software engineer does – instead of spending 10 minutes every few days reducing the prices and renewing the items, why not spend 3 weeks to build out a fully decked out Electron app that does all of the above automatically for you? Why not indeed...

In the end, it's been a fun ride and I learned a lot. And actually! now it's coming in handy as I'm finally starting to sell the backlog of items that I've accumulated.

Once I built it, I figured I'd offer it on gumroad, make a buck, why not... btw, the link is for a discounted version ($1 instead of $10) so that you lovely HN lot can try it out.

Curious if you all have thoughts / feedback!

Not sure what the future holds for the app – I might take it somewhere if there is demand and feedback, but for now, give it a try and hopefully it will help you out on your next move too!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 具有自动更新和自动降价功能的CL和FB转售应用程序
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 具有自動更新和自動降價功能的CL和FB轉售應用程序
description_zh-Hans:
我最近搬了家，有很多东西想扔掉。

我发现转售过程很麻烦--我需要在Facebook和Craigslist上发布两次相同的信息。我不得不更新物品，以便它们不会过期。

因此，我决定像任何头脑发热的务实的软件工程师那样做--与其每隔几天花10分钟来降低价格和更新物品，为什么不花3个星期来建立一个装备齐全的Electron应用程序，为你自动完成上述所有工作？为什么不呢......

最后，这是一次有趣的旅程，我学到了很多。

一旦我建立了它，我想我应该在gumroad上提供它，赚点钱，为什么不呢......另外，这个链接是一个折扣版本（1美元而不是10美元），这样你们这些可爱的HN人就可以试试了。

很好奇你们是否都有想法/反馈！

不确定这个应用程序的未来是什么--如果有需求和反馈，我可能会把它带到某个地方，但现在，给它一个尝试，希望它也会帮助你的下一步行动
